sentences.en: a striking illustration of 19th-century attitudes to women
sentences.cn: 19世纪时对待女性态度的鲜明例证。

sentences.en: An illustration of China's dynamism is that a new company is formed in Shanghai every 11 seconds.
sentences.cn: 说明中国活力的一个实例便是在上海每11秒钟就有一家新公司成立。

sentences.en: By way of illustration I'll refer to the behavior of rabbits.
sentences.cn: 我将举例说明兔子的行为.

sentences.en: He just cited a farfetched illustration.
He looked like his illustration , as he raised his eyes to Mr. Lob's face.
sentences.cn: 他抬起眼睛望着罗瑞先生的脸, 那样子正像他用以举例的孩子.

sentences.en: Illustration by example is better than explanation in words.
sentences.cn: 用实例说明比用词语解释清楚.

sentences.en: Illustration is often more useful than definition for showing what words mean.
sentences.cn: 用图解或示例解释词义往往比用定义解释更清楚.

sentences.en: It affords, says Morgan, " a good'illustration of the operation of the principle of natural selection. "
sentences.cn: 按照摩尔根的看法, 这一进步可以作为 “ 自然选择原则在发生作用的最好的例证 ”.

sentences.en: Perhaps the accompanying illustration will explain it.
sentences.cn: 可能所附的图表能对此作出解释。

sentences.en: Sir. J . Lubbock has recently remarked , that several minute crustaceans offer excellent illustration of this law.
sentences.cn: 卢布克爵士最近指出, 小型甲壳类中有几种较好的例子,可作为这一法则的说明.

sentences.en: The book contains 62 pages of illustrations.
The illustration had too much redundant detail.
sentences.cn: 解说中不必要的细节太多.

sentences.en: The illustration shows a cluster of five roses coloured apricot orange.
sentences.cn: 插图上是一簇杏橙色的玫瑰，一共5朵。

sentences.en: The marginal illustration is very interesting.
This composite illustration was made by putting together a number of drawings.
sentences.cn: 这本综合说明书是集若干图片汇合而成的.

sentences.en: This illustration shows a vertical section through the locust.
sentences.cn: 本图所示为蝗虫的纵剖面.

sentences.en: What a noble illustration of the tender laws of England!
sentences.cn: 对于宽厚体贴的英国法律来说,这是多么精采的写照 啊 !

words.tran_cn: 说明的；作例证的；解说的
插图画家；说明者；图解者
说明；[印刷]插图；[经]例证；图解

trans.tran_en: a picture in a book, article etc, especially one that helps you to understand it
